name: Bloodthorn
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

descriptions.description: Silences a target for 5.0 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30.0% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magic damage.Range: 900All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100.0% chance to crit for 140.0% more damage.
